channel.title: Outofboundsexception
channel.description: [code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 9463 at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.loadDrops(NPCDrops.java:43) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init>(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:71) Loaded clipmap in 70ms. [03/12/11 16:52]: Launching Intdubtpk <3... [03/12/11 16:52]: Loaded clipmap in 69ms. [03/12/11 16:52]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594[/code] if anyone could help, i would apreciate it :D

item.title: Outofboundsexception
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

I assume it’s in your npcDrops.cfg? Mind posting the line?

Read full topic

item.title: Outofboundsexception
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

The npcdrops array prob doesn’t go that high; expand it to reach it.

Read full topic

item.title: Outofboundsexception
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:2, topic:423960”]What is 9463? An npc or an item? Because you either cannot use the npc id 9463 because it’s “out of bounds” (too high), or likewise to the item id.

Or… the number 9463 is somewhere it shouldn’t be i.e. you have one too many item id’s corresponding to item amounts. If you found that hard to understand post a few lines around where this number resides and I’ll attempt to fix it for you.[/quote]
its an npc, ice strykewyrm

Read full topic

item.title: Outofboundsexception
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

What is 9463? An npc or an item? Because you either cannot use the npc id 9463 because it’s “out of bounds” (too high), or likewise to the item id.

Or… the number 9463 is somewhere it shouldn’t be i.e. you have one too many item id’s corresponding to item amounts. If you found that hard to understand post a few lines around where this number resides and I’ll attempt to fix it for you.

Read full topic
